description: django-longerusernameandemail provides a migration and a monkeypatch to make the django auth.user username and email fields longer, instead of the arbitrarily short 30 and 75 characters.

info.Keywords:: django long email username migration south

longdescription: django-longerusernameandemail provides a migration and a monkeypatch to make the django auth.user username and email fields longer, instead of the arbitrarily short 30 and 75 characters.
